To people having the problem with starting thegame and just having a black screen with just audio, install the directX thing it tells you too after you finish installing the game. The first time round I ignored it and got the problem but after I installed the DirectX it worked perfectly fine :) 

Happy Gaming!

To the people having the problem of having just a black screen with only audio, after it finishd installing it askes if you want to install the directX thing. INTALL IT. Solves the problem ^-^ I have the issue as well, and I decided to try getting the DirectX and it fixed it.

Happy Gaming!

If you see something like "Failed to write save game to Steam Cloud", it seems you tried to launch this game without administrative privileges or you haven't access to /Program Files/limbo folder.
Just uninstall and install it again (or move) to users/%username%/optionalfoldername/limbo.

Most trojans you will ever see in a torrent are false positives. Installers and keygens are usually picked up as viruses due to heuristics, which means that they do things similar to what some viruses do, but are themselves benign.
